properties.body:
WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 17.
S/V PETIT BLEU, 23 FOOT WHITE AND BLUE HULL,
ONE PERSON ON BOARD, ABANDONING SHIP
IN VICINITY 36-20.00N 73-17.00W AT 211617Z OCT.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO RCC NORFOLK.
PHONE: 757-398-6231,
FAX: 757-398-6392,
EMAIL: RCCNORFOLK@USCG.MIL.
